item.title: Fly Tip on Cleeve Common Road Passing Place, 29th May
item.description:
The location is the Cleeve Common Road which is about a quarter of a mile going towards the common from the Lone Tree Crossroads on the right hand side in a passing place. The tip consist of various plastic containers, papers, and general fast food packaging waste and was likely done onFriday 28th May sometime in the evening. Please can it be removed as quickly as possible as the local widlife will likely spread the food waste around..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stoke Road Dean Brook riverbank overgrown and requires cutting back, 27th May
item.description:
The riverbank alongside Stoke Road Old Forge Cottages are overgrown on the public footpath/pavement side and need cutting back otherwise it will hinder the narrow pavement space for buggies and pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Old Forge Cottage Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard
Report on FixMyStreet
